name: kobold
description: A ulauncher extension allowing you to query and interact with an koboldcpp instance

preferences.name: System Prompt
preferences.description: Provide a system prompt to overwrite what is in your particular modelfile
preferences.default_value: You are an inline assitant, keep your responses short.

preferences.name: Llama Headers
preferences.description: Optional Headers to be passed on every llama api request. Comma separated for multiple values.

preferences.name: Max Context Length
preferences.description: Maximum context length for the model

preferences.name: Max Length
preferences.description: Maximum length of the generated response

preferences.name: Repetition Penalty
preferences.description: Penalty for repeated words in the generated response

preferences.name: Repetition Penalty Range
preferences.description: Range for applying the repetition penalty

preferences.name: Repetition Penalty Slope
preferences.description: Slope for applying the repetition penalty

preferences.name: Temperature
preferences.description: Controls the randomness of the response

preferences.name: Top K
preferences.description: Number of highest probability tokens to consider for the next word

preferences.name: Top P
preferences.description: Cumulative probability threshold for token selection
